title: X-Men First Class 1080p hardcodedsubfan
description:
X-Men First Class 1080p

Hardcoded Subtitle notes:
All German and Russian language translated from the original Forced Subtitles.



This is an MP4 of the movie with the original Forced Subtitles from the DVD/Bluray now hardcoded into the picture.

If you are wanting to watch this on an Xbox, iPad, smartphone, basically any of the bagillion situations where an SRT file won't help you, then this is the version of the movie you want.

If you are the kind of person who thinks it's sacrilage (sp*) to hardcode subs, then don't download this. :P

Thanks,
hardcodedsubfan

p.s. In case you want to try this yourself: Original Video was downloaded from TPB, I forget who the original uploader was, sorry. Srt subtitle file was downloaded from subscene.com, edited for timing with Subtitle Edit. The video and subs were combined using VidCoder. Boo Yah!

Note: This is my first upload, so let me know if I didn't do it right. I will seed for a week, after that it's in the ether. (More hardcoded subs to come).
